Room.Name: Glacier Cavern
Room.ShortDescription: The majestic glacier's walls rise up from the cold ice you're standing on.
Room.LongDescription: The ice caverns allow you to see beyond the mountain landscape, into the massive and seemingly endless Ituk Glacier. The passage walls glow with sunlight and reflect your every movements. Reflections of yourself mesh in with the strange designs and creatures trapped within the ice.
